item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

i made one like this, but for gettin into big servers that r usualy full, like sunscape lol, i just crank my volume, and then it tryes to logg in, and then u get the canot connect to blah blah blah, but it keeps going, until it loggs in, and when it logs in i have it play that sound whenever windows shuts down =p so i walk away in hearing distance and do watever until i hear it hahha, ulto-lazy =p

item.title: AutoLogin simple, but works!
item.dc:creator: @piddlefiddle piddlefiddle
item.description:
@piddlefiddle wrote:

OK…you guyses here it is…my first script…it’s aweso-matic.

[scar]program Autologin;
const
//------Setup------//
username =‘enter your username here’ ;
password =‘enter your password here’ ;
//-----------------//

begin
MoveMouseSmooth(468, 291)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(500);
Sendkeys(username)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(373, 274)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(500);
SendKeys(password)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(331, 320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(600);
end.[/scar]

Use it or you can learn off it…i like blue…

Read full topic
